title.rendered: ARTICLE: “Date the rate, marry the home – Ample opportunity remains for brokers and their clients despite a slower market” [CANADIAN MORTGAGE PROFESSIONAL, JANUARY 2023]

content.rendered:
OPPORTUNITY EXISTS. While the last year has been unique and challenging, we see an opportunity in the market to continue to grow your business. If you’re a mortgage agent in the industry, here are our thoughts on what you can do to ensure growth despite market conditions.

 

Full article linked here.

Article Preview:
